name: Apprentice Witch
description:
Witch Apprentice

You are a fledgling witch, learning your craft. Today's lesson is potion mixing! Grab the bottles from the shelves and get mixing! Be careful, expect the unexpected when toying with magical potions!

I had hoped to maybe make a little shop game on top of this but it took too long making the combinations work! Maybe for a future sequel! I hope you enjoy the game and find all 11 potion effects!

Made in 3 hours for TriJam 200.

Potion Colours (Try to find all the effects!):

  • Red - ?
  • Blue - ?
  • Green - ?
  • Yellow - ?
  • Purple - ?
  • Orange - ?
  • Brown - ?
  • Yellowgreen - ?
  • Teal - ?
  • Violet-red - ?
Controls

Mouse only - Pour potions into the bottle on the table and then store or drink them.
